sentences.en: A clog or fetter on the equity of redemption is void.
sentences.cn: 阻碍和束缚衡平法上的赎回板均是无效的.

sentences.en: Don't clog up your memory with useless facts.
sentences.cn: 不要把脑袋塞满无用的东西.

sentences.en: Don't clog up your mind with useless information.
sentences.cn: 不要让你的头脑被无用的讯息所阻碍.

sentences.en: Don't clog your memory with useless facts.
sentences.cn: 你不要在你的记忆中堆满无益的事实.

sentences.en: Don't clog your mind with cares.
sentences.cn: 不要因忧虑而变得闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: Honey. A big old ugly - looking bird clog who was brown and white.
sentences.cn: 蜜儿是一条又大又老、相貌丑陋、毛色褐白相间的捕鸟狗.

sentences.en: How do I check for a clog in the drain?
sentences.cn: 我怎样检查下水道里的阻塞物 呢 ?

sentences.en: In cotton and wool processing, short length fibers may clog sewers.
sentences.cn: 在棉毛生产中, 短纤维可能堵塞下水管道.

sentences.en: Pour the swill through a sieve, or it will clog the sewer.
sentences.cn: 倒泔水时过滤一下, 否则容易堵塞下水道.

sentences.en: Sludge can also clog oil passages and prevent normal engine lubrication.
sentences.cn: 油泥还会阻塞油路,妨碍发动机的正常润滑工作.

sentences.en: Some of the particles clog my smaller passages and some actually sear my tissues.
sentences.cn: 有些微粒堵塞我的小气道,有些甚至使我的组织凋萎.

sentences.en: That heavy oil will clog up the machinery, ie prevent it from working properly.
sentences.cn: 这种重油会妨碍机器的运转.

sentences.en: The leaves clog our drains in the fall.
sentences.cn: 秋天的落叶堵塞了排水沟.

sentences.en: The result is that the lungs clog up with a thick mucus.
sentences.cn: 检验结果是肺部被厚厚的黏液堵住了。

sentences.en: tourists whose cars clog the roads each summer
sentences.cn: 每年夏天开着汽车堵塞道路的游客

sentences.en: We talked and danced the clog dance together!
sentences.cn: 我们一起谈天、跳木屐舞.

trans.tran_en: a shoe made of wood with a leather top that covers the front of your foot but not your heel
Clogs are heavy leather or wooden shoes with thick, wooden soles
to block something or become blocked
